author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Heat two tablespoons of olive oil in a large non-stick frying pan. Add the  broccoli florets and sauté for 3-4 minutes, to soften. Add the spring onions and sauté for a further 1-2 minutes.  Stir in the mango slices and then add the cooked noodles.  Stir in the chilli and continue to stir-fry for a further 3-4 minutes. Finally add the herbs with a tablespoon of olive oil. Heat for another minute and transfer to a serving plate to serve.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,  6 long stemmed broccoli florets,  4 spring onions, chopped,  ½ mango, peeled and sliced,  110g/4oz egg noodles, cooked according to packet instructions,  ¼ scotch bonnet chilli, finely chopped,  2 tbsp fresh chopped herbs,  1 tbsp olive oil
